name: Dashie's Puh-ranormal Activity
description:
Dashie's Puh-ranormal Activity is a 3D first-person comedy/horror game developed for the YouTuber Dashie. (YouTube: DashieGames, DashieXP, DashieXP2). The game features various references to Dashie's skits and videos. In this game, Dashie is being haunted by the ghost of his ex and must find a way to escape and survive.

Features:
  • Multiple Enemies
  • Multiple Sections
  • Lots of jump scares
  • Many references to Dashie's skits and videos
  • Humor
